items.sentence: I\'m very sorry, but I seem to have lost your umbrella.
I\'ve been told that you were looking for a babysitter.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve seen Tom this happy.
We don\'t need to waste money on things we don\'t need.
I\'m going to the hospital this afternoon to visit Tom.
I\'m having a hard time getting Tom to do his homework.
I\'m not going to do everything Tom has asked me to do.
I\'m not going to leave until I find out what happened.
I seldom use cash anymore. I usually use a credit card.
We\'re sorry to tell you this, but Tom didn\'t make it.
